alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 27 at 9:10AM EST until December 28 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Pembroke, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lumber River near Lumberton. * WHEN...From this morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Low land flooding will occur along the river. The flood waters may affect some residential property as water backs up into the drainage ditches in the city. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 11.7 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by late tonight.
